remarks: Left- and right-associative property of an associative algebra.  Notice that the scalars are commuted!  (Contributed by AV, 14-Aug-2019.)
statement:
assa2ass.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
assa2ass.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
assa2ass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
assa2ass.m $e |- .* = ( .r ` F ) $.
assa2ass.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
assa2ass.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` W ) $.
assa2ass $p |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ ( A e. B /\ C e. B ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .x. X ) .X. ( C .x. Y ) ) = ( ( C .* A ) .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) ) $.
